hudson.tasks.Shell.command: sudo cat > ./current.repo << EOF [current] name=current baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/Mainline/standard_x86_64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0 EOF sudo cp current.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/ #sudo dnf install -y --disablerepo=* --enablerepo=current --installroot=/home/jenkins/install_root zip #sleep 300 pip3 install tqdm
